Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Nottingham
ShortDescription: 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Narragansett, 65th, Harlem and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Nottingham.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Narragansett, 65th, Harlem and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Nottingham.

Allow extra travel time.
